detaileddescription.para: Structure that stores the function pointer wrappers to perform the IO

briefdescription.para: Place holder function, it is used when the file format does not support integrity checksums.

detaileddescription.para:
data
Does not matter.
a
does not matter.
void.
THis function is passed as a reference when different file formats do not actually compute an integrity checksum. It helps to avoid if statements in the code and provides a more stream line code format.

briefdescription.para: This function initializes the FTI_IO structure with the functions that write the ckpt file.

detaileddescription.para:
ckptIO
File format selected by the user in the configuration file.
FTI_Exec
Execution environment of the FTI.
int On success FTI_SCES
This function actually initializes the execution paths of the write checkpoint function.
